\\
Debo Olaosebikan\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/gigster) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/e12f171a4ea3c40c73ef3e8b77453a6deaec1f6e.png)\\
\\
GiveMeTapW15London, UK\\
\\
We produce & sell stainless steel water bottles that enables people…\\
\\
GiveMeTap is a social enterprise. Our mission is to make clean drinking water available to everyone, everywhere.\\
\\
We create stainless steel water bottles, and each bottle funds 5 years of clean water for someone in Africa. When you get a GiveMeTap bottle, you also have access to the free-water network of cafes and shops who give free tap water to people on the go. No questions, no hassle.\\
\\
We build water projects in remote villages and elect a water committee to run the maintenance of the water. So far we have made an impact in Namibia, Malawi, and Ghana to bring clean water for the first time.\\
\\
We like to think of this as ‘Water for You, Water for Everyone’.\\
\\
We help awesome companies create custom bottles for their staff, customers, and events so that they can stay hydrated, reduce plastic waste and help fund water projects. Our partners include:\\
\\
Deloitte\\
HSBC\\
YCombinator\\
Google\\
TED\\
Flexport\\
Legal & General\\
Richard Branson's The Lodge, Switzerland\\
Cambridge University \\
\\
Want to get your company involved? Visit http://bit.ly/2j2Ef64\\
\\
Water for you. Water for everyone.\\
\\

GovDashW22New York, NY, USA\\
\\
AI platform for winning government contracts.\\
\\
GovDash is an AI platform that assists government contractors with capture, proposal development, contract management & more—in one place.\\
\\
Automate BD workflows across the Capture Cloud, Proposal Cloud, and Contract Cloud.\\

Curtis Mason\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/govdash) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/524e65f0ea0097b484282603109656a296837686.png)\\
\\
GrainW20Oakland, CA, USA\\
\\
Grain transforms the debit card you already have into a credit card…\\
\\
Grain is a mobile app that transforms the debit card you already have into a credit card by linking it to a line of credit based on your cash flow. For the millennials, Gen Zs, and immigrants who are afraid of falling into crippling credit card debt, there is now a distinct market opportunity to offer an alternative to how these 100M people access and manage credit.\\
\\
Oakland, CA, USA\\
\\
Grain transforms the debit card you already have into a credit card…\\
\\
Grain is a mobile app that transforms the debit card you already have into a credit card by linking it to a line of credit based on your cash flow. For the millennials, Gen Zs, and immigrants who are afraid of falling into crippling credit card debt, there is now a distinct market opportunity to offer an alternative to how these 100M people access and manage credit.\\

Carl-Alain Memnon\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/grain) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/b891c4bf87168fc420c4d1e54bdef2c47bc728f7.png)\\
\\
GreyW22US-101, San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Banking services for remote workers and digital nomads\\
\\
Grey provides US, EU, and UK accounts for remote workers in emerging markets. For the first time, western companies feel comfortable recruiting skilled workers from anywhere and Grey is making it easy for these workers to receive their salary, save in foreign currency, convert to local currency and spend.\\
\\
US-101, San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Banking services for remote workers and digital nomads\\
\\
Grey provides US, EU, and UK accounts for remote workers in emerging markets. For the first time, western companies feel comfortable recruiting skilled workers from anywhere and Grey is making it easy for these workers to receive their salary, save in foreign currency, convert to local currency and spend.\\

HarberaW25San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI Healthcare Provider Credentialing Software\\
\\

\\
Veronica Nutting\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/harbera) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/48f09dfa8b59f8e987b3a43c44b0adcd865fe145.png)\\
\\
HarperW25San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI-native commercial insurance brokerage\\
\\
At Harper, we are building a fully autonomous commercial insurance brokerage powered by AI. Our initial focus is on mid-sized businesses with complex insurance needs, but our vision is to eventually serve every business in the country.\\
\\
By leveraging AI to automate key workflows in the insurance process, we efficiently secure optimal coverage for each client's unique requirements at competitive prices and with rapid turnaround. Our AI system learns from the expertise of our brokers, accumulating not just knowledge but also the specific workflows, data, and capabilities that pave the way to full autonomy.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI-native commercial insurance brokerage\\
\\
At Harper, we are building a fully autonomous commercial insurance brokerage powered by AI. Our initial focus is on mid-sized businesses with complex insurance needs, but our vision is to eventually serve every business in the country.\\
\\
By leveraging AI to automate key workflows in the insurance process, we efficiently secure optimal coverage for each client's unique requirements at competitive prices and with rapid turnaround. Our AI system learns from the expertise of our brokers, accumulating not just knowledge but also the specific workflows, data, and capabilities that pave the way to full autonomy.\\

Dakotah Rice\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/harper) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5f51be3e6016c33657688a682b7eb23e8ee1044a.png)\\
\\
HavenW23\\
\\
AI workforce for property management\\
\\
Haven is building AI Agents to automate property management operations. Our first Agent is automating the maintenance coordination process. This means answering the phone when tenants have a maintenance issue, diagnosing the issue, dispatching a technician, and then following up with tenants to make sure the issue is resolved.\\
\\
AI workforce for property management\\
\\
Haven is building AI Agents to automate property management operations. Our first Agent is automating the maintenance coordination process. This means answering the phone when tenants have a maintenance issue, diagnosing the issue, dispatching a technician, and then following up with tenants to make sure the issue is resolved.\\

Helicarrier (prev Buycoins)S18Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Cryptocurrency infrastructure for Africa.\\
\\
Helicarrier (previously Buycoins) is building cryptocurrency infrastructure for Africa. \\
\\
Sendcash is an app that lets Africans in the diaspora send money back home. Buycoins is the easiest place to buy, sell, and manage your cryptocurrency portfolio.\\

\\
Timi Ajiboye\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/helicarrier-prev-buycoins) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/a8a2ae7dcbe50748392b1a3e607a1f00aa633f51.png)\\
\\
Helium HealthS17Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Africa's #1 healthcare technology provider.\\
\\
Helium Health provides a suite of digital health tools for healthcare providers, payers and patients across Africa — most prominent of which is our maiden electronic medical records (EMR) & hospital management information system (HMIS) for emerging markets, HeliumOS.\\
\\
We offer business loans to healthcare providers through our HeliumCredit product. We also work with donors and governments in executing public health strategies. Finally, we have built the largest healthcare data repository on Africans with over 1 million health records.\\
\\
Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Africa's #1 healthcare technology provider.\\
\\
Helium Health provides a suite of digital health tools for healthcare providers, payers and patients across Africa — most prominent of which is our maiden electronic medical records (EMR) & hospital management information system (HMIS) for emerging markets, HeliumOS.\\
\\
We offer business loans to healthcare providers through our HeliumCredit product. We also work with donors and governments in executing public health strategies. Finally, we have built the largest healthcare data repository on Africans with over 1 million health records.\\
\\

Dimeji Sofowora\\
\\
COO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/helium-health) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/f8e898fc9723f38fdd01a22ea10b8856c3e66d4b.png)\\
\\
HeyfoodW22Ibadan, Nigeria\\
\\
Doordash for Africa\\
\\
Heyfood is building the “Doordash for Africa”. But unlike Doordash in America, we make a profit on every single delivery, from day 1. \\
\\
We are targeting Millennials and Gen Z urban professionals in Africa’s top 70 cities, withing 10 years there will be 140m number of these people, we assume they will want to order food once a week, we make $1 per delivery, this represents a $51B market.\\
\\
Ibadan, Nigeria\\
\\
Doordash for Africa\\
\\
Heyfood is building the “Doordash for Africa”. But unlike Doordash in America, we make a profit on every single delivery, from day 1. \\
\\
We are targeting Millennials and Gen Z urban professionals in Africa’s top 70 cities, withing 10 years there will be 140m number of these people, we assume they will want to order food once a week, we make $1 per delivery, this represents a $51B market.\\

Demilade Odetara\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/heyfood) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/e59c2327810cab253f71704ec7dd18ea96bfc242.png)\\
\\
HingetoW16Oakland, CA, USA\\
\\
A B2B marketplace that connects inventory to online stores\\
\\
Hingeto is a technology platform that enables fashion brands & influencers to sell past and future masterpieces with zero inventory risk.\\
\\
We are backed by Y Combinator (W16), Kapor Capital, Cross Culture Ventures, Precursor Ventures, Stanford University / StartX & several angels (including Andrew Iguodala)\\

\\
Yaw Owusu-Barimah\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/hingeto) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/2c9c9e9401c331a915e89803f89ed7452f03d962.png)\\
\\
HYBRDF24Boston, MA, USA\\
\\
Get faster & stronger\\
\\
HYBRD helps you get stronger and faster. It pulls in all your training data, from every wearable and workout tracking app you use, and uses it to personalize training plans specifically to you and your goals\\
\\
Existing products tend to focus on only one type of exercise (either cardio or strength), leaving hybrid athletes juggling disconnected tools. As hybrid athletes themselves the founders found this frustrating and set out to build the unified approach they needed for their training.\\
\\
Three of HYBRD’s founders previously worked at WHOOP, each leading teams across product, growth and analytics. Ruiters, the CTO, was a senior tech lead at AWS. In parallel, Mats was a member of the US national rowing team and Ben, Shoe and Ruiters have all completed Ironman 70.3s. The team's VP of tech/founding engineer Michael rowed at Cornell and is ex-WHOOP as well. \\
\\
Boston, MA, USA\\
\\
Get faster & stronger\\
\\
HYBRD helps you get stronger and faster. It pulls in all your training data, from every wearable and workout tracking app you use, and uses it to personalize training plans specifically to you and your goals\\
\\
Existing products tend to focus on only one type of exercise (either cardio or strength), leaving hybrid athletes juggling disconnected tools. As hybrid athletes themselves the founders found this frustrating and set out to build the unified approach they needed for their training.\\
\\
Three of HYBRD’s founders previously worked at WHOOP, each leading teams across product, growth and analytics. Ruiters, the CTO, was a senior tech lead at AWS. In parallel, Mats was a member of the US national rowing team and Ben, Shoe and Ruiters have all completed Ironman 70.3s. The team's VP of tech/founding engineer Michael rowed at Cornell and is ex-WHOOP as well. \\

\\
Mats Terwiesch\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/hybrd) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/a16e421a067f9b41e80bcc361abe747f87cfe040.png)\\
\\
HyperGlueW21San Francisco Bay Area, CA, USA\\
\\
Business intelligence on text\\
\\
There is more text generated than any one person or team can read. A single product team can not hope to sift through their thousands of feedback responses and determine the signal amongst the noise.\\
\\
Hyperglue enables operators, product managers, and analysts to instantly access machine intelligence on large text datasets without the engineering or headcount overhead required to deploy natural language AI within their business.\\
\\
San Francisco Bay Area, CA, USA\\
\\
Business intelligence on text\\
\\
There is more text generated than any one person or team can read. A single product team can not hope to sift through their thousands of feedback responses and determine the signal amongst the noise.\\
\\
Hyperglue enables operators, product managers, and analysts to instantly access machine intelligence on large text datasets without the engineering or headcount overhead required to deploy natural language AI within their business.\\
\\

\\
ideate.xyzS24San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
ideate.xyz is an AI-powered 3D art suite on the web\\
\\
Generate. Paint. Refine.\\
\\
ideate.xyz is an AI-powered 3D art suite on the web, taking your ideas from concept to production ready assets in record time.\\
\\
Our powerful text to image to 3D pipeline rapidly generates model assets using the latest AI tech.\\
\\
Rapidly generate and edit 3D model textures in your browser using our texture projection and inpainting editor.\\
\\
Get your 3D assets production ready using our texture processing, upscaling and compression algorithms.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\

\\
Elliott Thompson\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/ideate-xyz) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/9001d7186569d3da9eef7ffe9711b1df75087e47.png)\\
\\
InEventS19Atlanta, GA, USA\\
\\
In-Person, Hybrid and Virtual Event Management Software\\
\\
InEvent is an all in one platform that allows you to use multiple solutions (website, registration, mobile app, hospitality, check-in, badge printing, budgeting, etc) altogether, without having to upload data 3-4x times on different pages.\\
\\
Everything is available on the cloud, 24x7, for you and your attendees. Most of our competitors have modules that don't talk with each other, we solved this by creating a solid foundation that all of our solutions are built upon.\\
\\
We have already successfully improved more than 12,400 events, boosting more than 2,390,000 registrations so far. We have integrations with Salesforce, Marketo, Oracle, Microsoft and other vendors to create a simple, easy-to-use marketing ecosystem for all our customers.\\
\\
Discover the InEvent Virtual Lobby, the top event marketing solution in the world today: https://inevent.com/en/virtual-online-streaming-events-room-events-innovative.php\\
\\
Atlanta, GA, USA\\
\\
In-Person, Hybrid and Virtual Event Management Software\\
\\
InEvent is an all in one platform that allows you to use multiple solutions (website, registration, mobile app, hospitality, check-in, badge printing, budgeting, etc) altogether, without having to upload data 3-4x times on different pages.\\
\\
Everything is available on the cloud, 24x7, for you and your attendees. Most of our competitors have modules that don't talk with each other, we solved this by creating a solid foundation that all of our solutions are built upon.\\
\\
We have already successfully improved more than 12,400 events, boosting more than 2,390,000 registrations so far. We have integrations with Salesforce, Marketo, Oracle, Microsoft and other vendors to create a simple, easy-to-use marketing ecosystem for all our customers.\\
\\

Vinicius Neris\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/inevent) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/9e3dd6003ca20000769c840422166e061b42f9c6.png)\\
\\
Infiuss HealthS21Buffalo, NY, USA\\
\\
2 sided Marketplace for accelerating medical research\\
\\
We are building the world's first community of patients eager to contribute to and advance medical research. Our patient community platform offers health management, patient support and patient health data aggregation. We offer researcher's and life science companies with the opportunity to connect with these patients for their medical research needs. They recruit real patients for clinical trials, for bio specimens sourcing and to obtaining real world patient data.\\
\\
Buffalo, NY, USA\\
\\
2 sided Marketplace for accelerating medical research\\
\\
We are building the world's first community of patients eager to contribute to and advance medical research. Our patient community platform offers health management, patient support and patient health data aggregation. We offer researcher's and life science companies with the opportunity to connect with these patients for their medical research needs. They recruit real patients for clinical trials, for bio specimens sourcing and to obtaining real world patient data.\\

Melissa Bime\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/infiuss-health) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/a48984c0a7bc281e9b076876c8d571aaf44c799e.png)\\
\\
JarminF25San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
24/7 Machine Learning Engineer employees\\
\\
Jarmin.ai is your 24/7 ML eng employee that you hire. Just talk to Jarmin like any other employee and Jarmin handles your AI/ML work from there. Completely hand over full initiatives or individual tasks.\\
\\
Jarmin’s founding team is from Meta SuperIntelligence Labs (Staff Engineers), Apple (Machine Learning Engineer), AWS (scaling infra), Lockheed-Martin (Research), and JPMorganChase (SWE) with experience building AI/ML and automating complex work of Researchers, Data Scientists, ML Engineers with AI.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
24/7 Machine Learning Engineer employees\\
\\
Jarmin.ai is your 24/7 ML eng employee that you hire. Just talk to Jarmin like any other employee and Jarmin handles your AI/ML work from there. Completely hand over full initiatives or individual tasks.\\
\\
Jarmin’s founding team is from Meta SuperIntelligence Labs (Staff Engineers), Apple (Machine Learning Engineer), AWS (scaling infra), Lockheed-Martin (Research), and JPMorganChase (SWE) with experience building AI/ML and automating complex work of Researchers, Data Scientists, ML Engineers with AI.\\

Zack Leman\\
\\
Co-Founder & CTO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/jarmin) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/3dd0767f5aa369853ca43c4cfdc902eda25965f9.png)\\
\\
JopwellS15New York, NY, USA\\
\\
Career advancement for Black, Latinx & Native American professionals.\\
\\
Jopwell’s mission is to make a substantial, measurable impact on increasing Black, Latinx, and Native American representation in the workforce. Jopwell strives to build inclusive workplaces where our members can bring their authentic selves to work. We do this by assisting companies with their recruitment, marketing, and retention efforts for communities of color. \\
\\
New York, NY, USA\\
\\
Career advancement for Black, Latinx & Native American professionals.\\
\\
Jopwell’s mission is to make a substantial, measurable impact on increasing Black, Latinx, and Native American representation in the workforce. Jopwell strives to build inclusive workplaces where our members can bring their authentic selves to work. We do this by assisting companies with their recruitment, marketing, and retention efforts for communities of color. \\

Chad Munroe\\

Co-founder / CEO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/jupiter) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/ffc8188b9194b518de8d9010fba82b955eedab6f.png)\\
\\
KaizenX25\\
\\
Automate anything on the web.\\
\\
Kaizen leverages browser agents to enable instant integration into websites without APIs. Leading AI companies use Kaizen to read and write data from legacy portals in logistics, healthcare, and financial services.\\
\\
Automate anything on the web.\\
\\
Kaizen leverages browser agents to enable instant integration into websites without APIs. Leading AI companies use Kaizen to read and write data from legacy portals in logistics, healthcare, and financial services.\\

Michael Silver\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/kaizen) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/87dbae0192e991623d9682eb424425647194b9d8.png)\\
\\
KemNetS22Edmonton, AB, Canada\\
\\
KemNet supplies reformulated drugs for specific groups of patients.\\
\\
KemNet supplies pharmacies with premium reformulations of popular drugs that are more useful for specific groups of patients. For example, more than 30 pharmacies rely on KemNet to supply reformulated products for erectile dysfunction that work up to 8 times faster than alternatives. In addition to sexual function, products reformulated for novel drug delivery and supplied on KemNet include medications for hair growth, pain, weight loss and women's health.\\
\\
Edmonton, AB, Canada\\

Morẹ́nikẹ́ Ọláòṣebìkan\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/kemnet) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/8b5dd4f39eb884768a59cff95dd4952857392a08.png)\\
\\
KidatoW21Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
Online school for K12 education in Africa\\
\\
Parents in Africa face either public schools with student-teacher ratios as high as 50:1 or private schools with tuition fees as high as $7500 per year, per child. Kidato classes have student-teacher ratios of 5:1 and teach the same rigorous international curriculum as other private schools — but at a fraction of the price. In our second semester, Kidato has enrolled more than 30 students into our learning-from-home program as a replacement for brick-and-mortar schools. We expect to triple this enrollment by our third semester. \\
\\
Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
Online school for K12 education in Africa\\
\\
Parents in Africa face either public schools with student-teacher ratios as high as 50:1 or private schools with tuition fees as high as $7500 per year, per child. Kidato classes have student-teacher ratios of 5:1 and teach the same rigorous international curriculum as other private schools — but at a fraction of the price. In our second semester, Kidato has enrolled more than 30 students into our learning-from-home program as a replacement for brick-and-mortar schools. We expect to triple this enrollment by our third semester. \\

\\
Sam Gichuru\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/kidato) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/7ab8fa26571630366add5d76d46ba876b673c7b9.png)\\
\\
LandedW16San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
White-labeled shared appreciation down payment programs for employers\\
\\
Landed helps employers develop programs that increase access to homeownership for their employees. We do this by unlocking the power of shared appreciation to create down payment programs tailored to the needs of each institution, improving recruitment and retention of key talent. Unlike other programs, shared appreciation is mutually beneficial to funders and buyers, creating a self-renewing pool of capital that recycles as homebuyers exit the program.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
White-labeled shared appreciation down payment programs for employers\\
\\
Landed helps employers develop programs that increase access to homeownership for their employees. We do this by unlocking the power of shared appreciation to create down payment programs tailored to the needs of each institution, improving recruitment and retention of key talent. Unlike other programs, shared appreciation is mutually beneficial to funders and buyers, creating a self-renewing pool of capital that recycles as homebuyers exit the program.\\

Jonathan Asmis\\

LencoW22Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Pan-African digital bank for Africa's 50m businesses\\
\\
Lenco is a multi-currency digital bank for businesses in Africa. With Lenco, retail outlets, hospitality businesses and startups can easily pay vendors, suppliers and perform cross-border payment while having access to growth capital.\\
\\
Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Pan-African digital bank for Africa's 50m businesses\\
\\
Lenco is a multi-currency digital bank for businesses in Africa. With Lenco, retail outlets, hospitality businesses and startups can easily pay vendors, suppliers and perform cross-border payment while having access to growth capital.\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/lenco) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/8031cfe03db3dc6248ec6d87e84fe7cd9c685577.png)\\
\\
LendtableS20San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
We give employees cash advances for their 401k match and ESPP\\
\\
1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. \\
\\
Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. \\
\\
Workers now have thousands of dollars more without putting any money down, and we make money helping them do so -- we win if they win.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
We give employees cash advances for their 401k match and ESPP\\
\\
1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. \\

Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. \\

Mitchell Jones\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/lendtable) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/f98bea3f929dc1e5ae170d9423f432e2f8a35726.png)\\
\\
LiveFlowW21New York, NY, USA\\
\\
The #1 platform for multi-entity finance\\
\\
Meet your finance team's new superpower: LiveFlow eliminates the endless hours of manual financial reporting that keep CFOs and their teams stuck instead of driving strategic value. By automating your month-end close process from days to minutes, LiveFlow acts like your highest-performing analyst who works 24/7 with perfect accuracy. Not only does this free your team from the monthly close chaos, but it also means you can finally focus on what you actually became a CFO for – delivering insights that move your business forward.\\
\\
New York, NY, USA\\
\\

\\

\\
Aditya Nadkarni\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/joinlore) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/cb9289ab02184d3dcba8ce3089afff9258dfc183.png)\\
\\
LoulaW23New York, NY, USA\\
\\
Enabling birth & postpartum doulas to easily accept insurance.\\
\\
Loula is a software platform and national provider network for independent birth & postpartum doulas to boost their practices by accepting health insurance. Doulas typically operate outside of the traditional healthcare system and face an enormous learning curve and administrative burden when trying to accept insurance. This is why we created Loula. Starting with doulas in California, Loula handles their credentialing, contracting, and revenue cycle management so that they can focus on delivering the best quality care to their clients.\\
\\
New York, NY, USA\\
\\
Enabling birth & postpartum doulas to easily accept insurance.\\
\\
Loula is a software platform and national provider network for independent birth & postpartum doulas to boost their practices by accepting health insurance. Doulas typically operate outside of the traditional healthcare system and face an enormous learning curve and administrative burden when trying to accept insurance. This is why we created Loula. Starting with doulas in California, Loula handles their credentialing, contracting, and revenue cycle management so that they can focus on delivering the best quality care to their clients.\\
\\
Founders\\

\\
Lindsey Redd\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/loula) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/1d7946ea974cf7a753814028e684ac774c9c4073.png)\\
\\
LucidW25\\
\\
interactive video models\\
\\
We are building universe simulations powered by interactive video models.\\
\\
We train video models that simulate hyper-realistic environments with immersive control, replacing hard-coded game or physics engines with dynamic neural networks.\\
\\
We built the fastest action-conditioned diffusion video model (running at 20+fps on a 4090 gaming gpu) to simulate minecraft. It is 5x faster than other minecraft World Models and was trained with 100x less resources. Our unique insight was relying on aggressive compression in our tokenizer (128x versus the traditional 8x), and because attention scales quadratically with # of tokens our model can run blindingly faster.\\
\\
Now we’re training a hyper realistic world model!\\
\\
interactive video models\\
\\
We are building universe simulations powered by interactive video models.\\
\\
We train video models that simulate hyper-realistic environments with immersive control, replacing hard-coded game or physics engines with dynamic neural networks.\\
\\
We built the fastest action-conditioned diffusion video model (running at 20+fps on a 4090 gaming gpu) to simulate minecraft. It is 5x faster than other minecraft World Models and was trained with 100x less resources. Our unique insight was relying on aggressive compression in our tokenizer (128x versus the traditional 8x), and because attention scales quadratically with # of tokens our model can run blindingly faster.\\
\\
Now we’re training a hyper realistic world model!\\

Nebyou Zewde\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/lume-2) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/0d72c3d83183445e4992cb58763a5f76c303afd5.png)\\
\\
LumonaW24Cambridge, MA, USA\\
\\
AI-enabled search engine featuring insights from social media.\\
\\
Lumona is an AI-enabled search engine featuring insights from social media. When you’re looking to buy a new phone, instead of adding reddit to the end of your search and opening tabs of threads that take forever to get through, you can search on Lumona to get all of that processed for you on one page so you can make the best decision while saving time.\\
\\
Cambridge, MA, USA\\
\\
AI-enabled search engine featuring insights from social media.\\
\\
Lumona is an AI-enabled search engine featuring insights from social media. When you’re looking to buy a new phone, instead of adding reddit to the end of your search and opening tabs of threads that take forever to get through, you can search on Lumona to get all of that processed for you on one page so you can make the best decision while saving time.\\

Dylan Walker\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/lumona) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/a3822ef4eba7294b4ec36e7ecdbc27b2475f2b17.png)\\
\\
Maple MaterialsW19Richmond, CA, USA\\
\\
We turn CO2 into battery-grade graphite and oxygen.\\
\\
Maple Materials, Inc. (Richmond, California) develops a low-cost electrolysis process to split carbon dioxide into graphite and oxygen. Due to several unique features of our production process and product, we have potential to produce battery-grade graphite anode material one-third the cost of current graphite anode materials. When powered by renewables, this process has the potential to be carbon negative.\\
\\
Richmond, CA, USA\\
\\
We turn CO2 into battery-grade graphite and oxygen.\\
\\
Maple Materials, Inc. (Richmond, California) develops a low-cost electrolysis process to split carbon dioxide into graphite and oxygen. Due to several unique features of our production process and product, we have potential to produce battery-grade graphite anode material one-third the cost of current graphite anode materials. When powered by renewables, this process has the potential to be carbon negative.\\

\\
Drew Reid\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/maple-materials) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/47474d142b3a5ac7409ff5112dba8ad5d041cf6d.png)\\
\\
MarketForceS20Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
The SuperApp for neighbourhood merchants in Africa. \\
\\
MarketForce empowers neighbourhood merchants in Africa to source, order and pay for inventory digitally and conveniently, access a banking wallet with credit facilities, collect digital payments and earn extra income by offering agency baking services and reselling digital financial services such as airtime, electricity tokens and bill payments in their communities. \\
\\
Incorporated in 2019, MarketForce is a fast-growing company running an asset-light business model and is currently operational in 5 markets in Sub-Saharan Africa, with over 200,000 merchants and 180 consumer brands trading on the platform.\\
\\
Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
The SuperApp for neighbourhood merchants in Africa. \\
\\
MarketForce empowers neighbourhood merchants in Africa to source, order and pay for inventory digitally and conveniently, access a banking wallet with credit facilities, collect digital payments and earn extra income by offering agency baking services and reselling digital financial services such as airtime, electricity tokens and bill payments in their communities. \\
\\
Incorporated in 2019, MarketForce is a fast-growing company running an asset-light business model and is currently operational in 5 markets in Sub-Saharan Africa, with over 200,000 merchants and 180 consumer brands trading on the platform.\\

Mesongo Sibuti\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/marketforce) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/7e5614f0ff0430254c23e0743e5e0490fb5f826c.png)\\
\\
MarkItF25San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI Agents for Trade Compliance - Saving Companies from Tariffs\\
\\
MarkIt builds AI agents that work directly inside the workflows trade professionals use every day — Excel, PDFs, broker portals, and more. \\
From defensible classification, ACE report audits, and a self-updating system of record, it serves trade professionals end to end with agents intelligent enough to work in the complex environment. \\
\\
MarkIt brings reasoning, memory, and automation to global trade compliance, helping Suppliers, Brokers, and OEMs reduce errors, save time, and streamline operations in the growingly intense world of Global Trade.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\

\\
Roland Saavedra\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/markit) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/e851087b2c25e5bd175d39d8631791d74e04ebb1.png)\\
\\
Mecha HealthW25San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists\\
\\
Mecha Health builds foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists. We take medical images and process them using proprietary models to produce accurate draft medical reports. Our first model was built in less than two months, and beat Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI on clinical accuracy metrics. On top of that, it’s two orders of magnitude smaller and trained with a quarter of the data.\\
\\
We are partnering with the largest privately owned radiology practice in the US and a multinational tele-radiology company to provide them with their own foundation model, enabling their radiologists to go from reading 1 scan per hour to 1 scan every 5 minutes. By charging on a per scan basis, x-ray report generation represents a 40B+ market opportunity. \\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists\\
\\
Mecha Health builds foundation models to automate x-ray analysis for radiologists. We take medical images and process them using proprietary models to produce accurate draft medical reports. Our first model was built in less than two months, and beat Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI on clinical accuracy metrics. On top of that, it’s two orders of magnitude smaller and trained with a quarter of the data.\\
\\
We are partnering with the largest privately owned radiology practice in the US and a multinational tele-radiology company to provide them with their own foundation model, enabling their radiologists to go from reading 1 scan per hour to 1 scan every 5 minutes. By charging on a per scan basis, x-ray report generation represents a 40B+ market opportunity. \\

\\
Nina Montaña Brown\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/mecha-health) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/3354e34489d56a59c364c92cbf7d65cfee364055.png)\\
\\
Mecho AutotechS21Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
On-demand auto maintenance & repairs\\
\\
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). \\
\\
About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. \\
\\
We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part. \\
\\
Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
On-demand auto maintenance & repairs\\
\\
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). \\
\\
About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. \\
\\
We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part. \\
\\

Adil Yusuf\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/medium-biosciences) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/da247ee06a3c14ecd2ef6e9e67fac5e015f08c68.png)\\
\\
MentalHappyS18San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Group-Therapy Platform for Providers and Health Systems\\
\\
MentalHappy is a secure and compliant platform that leverages AI and data-driven analytics to enhance the group-based therapy experience and boost client/patient engagement. Our platform streamlines administrative tasks for providers, improves group participant self-management capabilities, automates group participant check-ins, and identifies group members who may be at risk. Additional features on the platform allow providers to schedule and host virtual sessions, engage members in secure chat, and share health resources, and offer support groups \\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Group-Therapy Platform for Providers and Health Systems\\
\\
MentalHappy is a secure and compliant platform that leverages AI and data-driven analytics to enhance the group-based therapy experience and boost client/patient engagement. Our platform streamlines administrative tasks for providers, improves group participant self-management capabilities, automates group participant check-ins, and identifies group members who may be at risk. Additional features on the platform allow providers to schedule and host virtual sessions, engage members in secure chat, and share health resources, and offer support groups \\

MenzaS23\\
\\
The 24/7 Data Analyst for Consumer Brands\\
\\
At Menza, we help consumer brands see what they need to know, when they need to know it. With 24/7 data monitoring, Menza finds insights for our customers that they would have otherwise missed.\\
\\
Data should make decisions easier, not more complicated.\\
\\
The 24/7 Data Analyst for Consumer Brands\\
\\
At Menza, we help consumer brands see what they need to know, when they need to know it. With 24/7 data monitoring, Menza finds insights for our customers that they would have otherwise missed.\\
\\
Data should make decisions easier, not more complicated.\\

Meter FeederW16Pittsburgh, PA, USA\\
\\
Helping fleets find and pay parking tickets\\
\\
Did you know that if your car is eligible for booting and towing in NYC, all of your registered vehicles are eligible? Now imagine you have thousands of vehicles in thousands of cities.\\
\\
We make sure that your vehicles are compliant.\\

\\
Daniel Lopretto\\
\\
CTO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/meter-feeder) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/8471337f6cd686658e82e47fb301dd81af79d869.png)\\
\\
MidenW2415a Ajanaku St, Opebi, Ikeja 101233, Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Card issuer processor and banking stack for businesses in Sub-…\\
\\
Miden is building a modern infrastructure that facilitates the launch of card programs and various financial products for businesses in Sub-Sahran Africa. Just by reducing integration time, card fraud, improving stability, and being customer focused we quickly rose to top 5 in TPV among card issuing Fintechs in Sub-Saharan Africa within 8 months of launch.\\
\\
We’re going to build the first comprehensive fintech and banking software stack for Africa, based on modern technology. We’re starting with a card issuer-processor.\\
\\
15a Ajanaku St, Opebi, Ikeja 101233, Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Card issuer processor and banking stack for businesses in Sub-…\\
\\
Miden is building a modern infrastructure that facilitates the launch of card programs and various financial products for businesses in Sub-Sahran Africa. Just by reducing integration time, card fraud, improving stability, and being customer focused we quickly rose to top 5 in TPV among card issuing Fintechs in Sub-Saharan Africa within 8 months of launch.\\
\\
We’re going to build the first comprehensive fintech and banking software stack for Africa, based on modern technology. We’re starting with a card issuer-processor.\\

Ini Udoh\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/miden) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/d7a0d14910b74597e1e70723a08a579e8dafe145.png)\\
\\
Mine (formerly Fizz)S21New York, NY, USA\\
\\
The AI personal finance company. \\
\\
Mine is the personal finance app designed to help you get ahead.\\
\\
Founded on the idea that financial independence begins with ownership — of your money, your momentum, and your decisions.\\
\\
We make the credit-builder thousands know and love, with budgeting and spend tracking features meant to help your money be the best version of itself. We’re also the makers of MoneyGPT, the money assistant that’s got your back.\\
\\
Young people today are stepping into a financial world built for someone else’s life.\\
\\
We give young adults the confidence and control to take charge of their financial journey with simple tools, smart guidance, and a system that works for the path you choose.\\
\\
Let’s build your future together. Get started at usemine.com\\
\\
Backed by Kleiner Perkins, SV Angel, Liquid 2 Ventures, and the founders of Handshake, Postmates, Public.com, Motive and many more.\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/mine) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5f8c54103232ce6ad4a91f33685eeaecbcd4d224.png)\\
\\
MiruS24San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Config Management for Robotics\\
\\
Miru makes it easy for robotics teams to manage, version, and deploy robot configurations. Developers use our well-documented APIs and UI components to automate configuration updates for both engineers and operators.\\
\\
In the long term, we're building software infrastructure to accelerate the automation of the physical world.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Config Management for Robotics\\
\\
Miru makes it easy for robotics teams to manage, version, and deploy robot configurations. Developers use our well-documented APIs and UI components to automate configuration updates for both engineers and operators.\\

In the long term, we're building software infrastructure to accelerate the automation of the physical world.\\

Armel Talla\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/miru-ml) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/99c837f7df76621b15335bd8605214d030fa2181.png)\\
\\
Miyagi LabsW25New York, NY, USA\\
\\
AI tutors for exam prep\\
\\
Miyagi Labs is an AI-powered exam prep platform that helps students ace tests like the SAT and ACT through our AI tutor, personalized study plans, thousands of practice questions, and realistic practice exams.\\
\\
We’re building the platform we wish we had when studying for exams. No more running out of practice questions. Track your progress as your rating in different exam categories increases, and know exactly what you need to practice most.\\
\\
We envision a world where students anywhere can come to Miyagi to ace their exams and receive personalized, world-class AI tutoring designed to unlock their full potential.\\
\\
New York, NY, USA\\
\\
AI tutors for exam prep\\
\\
Miyagi Labs is an AI-powered exam prep platform that helps students ace tests like the SAT and ACT through our AI tutor, personalized study plans, thousands of practice questions, and realistic practice exams.\\
\\
We’re building the platform we wish we had when studying for exams. No more running out of practice questions. Track your progress as your rating in different exam categories increases, and know exactly what you need to practice most.\\
\\
We envision a world where students anywhere can come to Miyagi to ace their exams and receive personalized, world-class AI tutoring designed to unlock their full potential.\\

Tyrone Davis III\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/miyagi-labs) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/f0b34817619a35bbf1da135af695c381b331b83a.png)\\
\\
MonecoS22Paris, France\\
\\
Neobank for African migrants in Europe\\
\\
Moneco is a neobank targeting the migrant communities in Europe, starting with the African diaspora. We are making banking easier and more affordable for underserved communities, starting with a current account, a payment card and free remittances. The long term vision is to turn Moneco into a one-stop-shop where all of their financial needs will be addressed. \\
\\
Paris, France\\
\\
Neobank for African migrants in Europe\\
\\
Moneco is a neobank targeting the migrant communities in Europe, starting with the African diaspora. We are making banking easier and more affordable for underserved communities, starting with a current account, a payment card and free remittances. The long term vision is to turn Moneco into a one-stop-shop where all of their financial needs will be addressed. \\

\\
Shams Radjabaly\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/moneco) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/bf5869533f1b1d2f6d799a42ec688b5405a0244f.png)\\
\\
MoniW22Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Group Financing for small businesses across Africa.\\
\\
Moni finances small businesses in groups across Africa. The collective responsibility of the group serves as a collateral on the loan while the social pressure from the members ensures on-time repayment. There are over 44million SMBs in Africa. \\
\\
We launched 7 months ago and we already have $72k MRR growing at 50% MoM. We achieved 99% repayment on 11,000 units of loans with over $5M disbursed. This is 15 times higher than most financial services in Africa.\\
\\
Femi (CEO) worked previously with the World Bank with a focus on financial services while Dapo (CTO) led the development of the technology for one of the largest digital lending apps\\
\\
We are also backed by Y Combinator(W22), Magic Fund, Ventures Platform, Voltron Capital and more.\\
\\
Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Group Financing for small businesses across Africa.\\
\\
Moni finances small businesses in groups across Africa. The collective responsibility of the group serves as a collateral on the loan while the social pressure from the members ensures on-time repayment. There are over 44million SMBs in Africa. \\
\\
We launched 7 months ago and we already have $72k MRR growing at 50% MoM. We achieved 99% repayment on 11,000 units of loans with over $5M disbursed. This is 15 times higher than most financial services in Africa.\\
\\
Femi (CEO) worked previously with the World Bank with a focus on financial services while Dapo (CTO) led the development of the technology for one of the largest digital lending apps\\
\\
We are also backed by Y Combinator(W22), Magic Fund, Ventures Platform, Voltron Capital and more.\\

MonoW21Lagos, Nigeria\\
\\
Plaid for Africa, but better. \\

Tejas Bhakta\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/morph) [mReliefW16Chicago, IL, USA\\
\\
mRelief has built an easy-to-use platform and web and text messaging…\\
\\
mRelief is a nonprofit that provides an easy-to-use platform on the web and text messaging -- at 74544 -- for Americans to sign up for SNAP. Built on public datasets provided by the USDA on BBCE and COVID-19 Waivers, they help people find out if they might be likely eligible for SNAP in all 50 states and DC. \\
\\
Chicago, IL, USA\\
\\
mRelief has built an easy-to-use platform and web and text messaging…\\
\\
mRelief is a nonprofit that provides an easy-to-use platform on the web and text messaging -- at 74544 -- for Americans to sign up for SNAP. Built on public datasets provided by the USDA on BBCE and COVID-19 Waivers, they help people find out if they might be likely eligible for SNAP in all 50 states and DC. \\

\\
Genevieve Nielsen\\
\\
CTO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/mrelief) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/ead23204732cf71066d05d95b633fe5109de70e7.png)\\
\\
MyriaW22Los Angeles, CA, USA\\
\\
A marketplace of luxury services for the ultra-wealthy\\
\\
Myria is a private community and concierge for off-market goods & services — the things you can't Google. \\
\\
Ultra-high net worth individuals spend $390 billion per year ($1.3 million each) on lifestyle, but they still struggle to find everything they want. Why?\\
\\
Because the best of any category — homes, boats, restaurant reservations — the best stuff is never listed online. Likewise, the best people don’t need the internet to find a new client or job. \\
\\
The best is always off-market. Myria is the Off-Marketplace. \\
\\
Myria helps off-market sellers reach the nicest and wealthiest buyers. In turn, we help the world’s most successful people access the best of everything, give back, and get the most out of life. \\
\\
If it’s off-market, it’s on Myria! \\
\\

![](https://bookface-images.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/avatars/ac1b94ff927f7de6d93fd7962a4e006713078d40.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAQC4NIECAKY3HLRV2%2F20260109%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260109T174912Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEOD%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIHl3X8AhjHM7RDM9WbOWX2iCxQIMrqQs2a6cb5oF6digAiEAkhg%2FiXGJXXIJjwgSxApQgag5PlaXgZk3nikIEkTo%2Fakq7gMIqf%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgwwMDYyMDE4MTEwNzIiDNpctOWfkBEm9mO7HyrCAxqWZvT9S9J76fs3aSSzndnPUsnS%2Bf7CWXqU7X6r4lJcstwjAhAaj0f%2F6ua8MSi4H%2FztPwx0bNcVJMmcfsxO77PzMc9bZrj9B5vypVlNaTqMikqC56NInQLUJxe17WiBGSYWTeYlIbxGJdoiZxgJSkMhs%2F5I6dqfmfutjrTFAHFn37DEpCsl%2BF167SgL0xUOdIKurnVtjCT4iPwpen%2BJ92pgdIcKgF2Ktbg0MZvcPBYlpvncReO11pZbhJ7coakgiJLL4I1zwGiDp5hhPeuxbFm8bFg2pv8wfsRa4f3UdyNRWAbIruAGQJLFiflt0KAmqkHgHctXA4FLeoauQ6sj4%2F9hI6IYR42YDWo1U%2BFvTuMvRXhNfWxF0ulQN5xa4FjddtmlkX2FSFN4bI90d%2BZm0zS2XCKf5fGH6TKCtdjghxE2tnZ6hyDGPkmPGITg9ZncLH2pEPJ8XFGw%2FVhVVfHJIzT42aUM8lZbZNdQLDpJLXCVRT7dPktOQ5493kcBVgA3KWkim7G6wY54R821NocdK8Ej8ikUNDTHaOSdqR6BvoJFT17mpyKgFraWo5FIANmI9kD%2FW0IijANct0P3dDgpOIOmNDD6zoTLBjqlAQsPUXT%2F2hE6fsGHHlV7GROLQsR%2FOKvNWahIClvLpy5YclzCAa2QFvimOMOVY%2FcDswVuwiOSm%2BcOuKIthL3YXGgTkV2EKGD2kCd%2FV3iGQLaaG5%2FyButYs8e%2BTxQRK03RbQ7IlOAKXT3ZHOEg7BvzMKOQO3Xe4nH6sw6WjC1hJD9o%2FQiIbaYswYSU1SSSXhLP5PFtQpLKJ6qvKJkSCpcVrPRqAW2S2Q%3D%3D&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=c3d42faed487f66fb2eb455e48b18ee5e4eddb1d1a7e26bda20efbd843f3990c)\\
\\
Benjamin Fernandes\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/nala) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/79994d20b9593a1de0a8c008c0d68ca04c0c1aa1.png)\\
\\
NasdiscS21San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
A marketplace for vinyl, cassettes and cds\\
\\
Nasdisc is a marketplace for the $4B worth of records purchased every year.\\
\\
The vinyl market has seen exponential growth in the past decade - the first 6 months of this year has already seen an increase of 108% in sales. Our platform takes a 12% cut, making this a $400mm opportunity that is more than doubling every year.\\
\\
Pressing plants are backed up years out, bots buy limited releases in seconds, and record prices are skyrocketing in both retail and aftermarket sales. Despite this growth, the only dedicated marketplace is difficult to use, doesn’t process transactions, yet facilitates over $600mm in vinyl exchanges per year. \\
\\
This is why I finally decided to quit my job at Google and recruit my best friends from college to fix it. We’re all software engineers and have been passionate about music and vinyl since we were kids, and have $50k in records ourselves.\\
\\
We started building a marketplace in July and launched our website 4 weeks ago. We now have $1k / week in sales, and $50k in listings.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
A marketplace for vinyl, cassettes and cds\\
\\
Nasdisc is a marketplace for the $4B worth of records purchased every year.\\
\\
The vinyl market has seen exponential growth in the past decade - the first 6 months of this year has already seen an increase of 108% in sales. Our platform takes a 12% cut, making this a $400mm opportunity that is more than doubling every year.\\
\\
Pressing plants are backed up years out, bots buy limited releases in seconds, and record prices are skyrocketing in both retail and aftermarket sales. Despite this growth, the only dedicated marketplace is difficult to use, doesn’t process transactions, yet facilitates over $600mm in vinyl exchanges per year. \\
\\
This is why I finally decided to quit my job at Google and recruit my best friends from college to fix it. We’re all software engineers and have been passionate about music and vinyl since we were kids, and have $50k in records ourselves.\\
\\
We started building a marketplace in July and launched our website 4 weeks ago. We now have $1k / week in sales, and $50k in listings.\\

\\
Christian White\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/nasdisc) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5b78f8543daddcbab960f2418bf3909cc4b5b026.png)\\
\\
NashW22Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
All in one finance platform for borderless businesses in Africa\\
\\
Nash enables finance teams to manage all their finance flows in one place and craft their money flow experiences globally. Our ledger-based operating system allows your borderless business to connect all your money accounts, accounting systems, payment service providers, treasury operations, spend management in one place. \\
\\
Our mission is to enable borderless commerce in Africa. We achieve this initially by providing your team with all the finance tools needed to build, scale, and grow your borderless business without the need for a costly and complex in-house infrastructure. \\
\\
Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
All in one finance platform for borderless businesses in Africa\\
\\
Nash enables finance teams to manage all their finance flows in one place and craft their money flow experiences globally. Our ledger-based operating system allows your borderless business to connect all your money accounts, accounting systems, payment service providers, treasury operations, spend management in one place. \\
\\
Our mission is to enable borderless commerce in Africa. We achieve this initially by providing your team with all the finance tools needed to build, scale, and grow your borderless business without the need for a costly and complex in-house infrastructure. \\

Muhga Eltigani\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/naturall-club) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/f3da9e158e41c3292ffa4b13f75dbd95d298fef9.png)\\
\\
NewCraftW18\\
\\
Universal API for HR & Payroll\\
\\
NewCraft makes it easy for developers to connect to employee platforms like Workday, ADP, and Paylocity with a single API. To get access to these systems, some companies have spent over $10M in development costs alongside years of business development efforts. We believe innovators can build the future of employment faster with simplified access. On top of standardizing data across employee systems into a universal API, we offer a modern developer experience with test environments, documentation, and security.\\
\\
Universal API for HR & Payroll\\
\\
NewCraft makes it easy for developers to connect to employee platforms like Workday, ADP, and Paylocity with a single API. To get access to these systems, some companies have spent over $10M in development costs alongside years of business development efforts. We believe innovators can build the future of employment faster with simplified access. On top of standardizing data across employee systems into a universal API, we offer a modern developer experience with test environments, documentation, and security.\\

Cameron Sadler\\
\\
CEO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/newcraft) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/280805d97b8f928525e064cfec1a11ad08073997.png)\\
\\
New StoryS15Atlanta, GA, USA\\
\\
We pioneer solutions to end the global housing crisis by empowering…\\
\\
Since its inception, NS has raised over $80 million to build thousands of homes across Latin America and impact ~20,000 individuals. In 2021, NS launched a venture capital fund, Hometeam Ventures, focused on early-stage construction and housing innovations. NS graduated from Y Combinator and is a 4x recipient of Fast Company’s Most Innovative Company.\\
\\
Atlanta, GA, USA\\
\\
We pioneer solutions to end the global housing crisis by empowering…\\
\\
Since its inception, NS has raised over $80 million to build thousands of homes across Latin America and impact ~20,000 individuals. In 2021, NS launched a venture capital fund, Hometeam Ventures, focused on early-stage construction and housing innovations. NS graduated from Y Combinator and is a 4x recipient of Fast Company’s Most Innovative Company.\\

Yinka Adewale\\
\\
CEO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/nomba) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/37d72609fbfc24b4a158ddb750a5b26591ee74b6.png)\\
\\
NovigS22New York, NY, USA\\
\\
America's #1 Sports Prediction Market\\
\\
Novig is a sports prediction market that eliminates the need for traditional sportsbooks by creating a two-sided marketplace. \\
\\
We do this by enabling users to trade directly against friends or the market, rather than against the house, making the betting experience more efficient, fair, and, most importantly, profitable. \\
\\
New York, NY, USA\\
\\
America's #1 Sports Prediction Market\\
\\
Novig is a sports prediction market that eliminates the need for traditional sportsbooks by creating a two-sided marketplace. \\
\\
We do this by enabling users to trade directly against friends or the market, rather than against the house, making the betting experience more efficient, fair, and, most importantly, profitable. \\
\\

\\
Kelechi Ukah\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/novig) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/2e20f659338993dfe61925632a05952fe44797ed.png)\\
\\
Ocular AIW24San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI-Native Data Engine for LLMs, Computer Vision, & Enterprise AI\\
\\
Ocular AI is the data annotation engine for Generative AI, Computer Vision, and Enterprise AI models.\\
\\
We help you transform unstructured, multi-modal data into golden datasets to power generative AI, frontier models, and computer vision. \\
\\
Ocular Foundry is the most intuitive, data-centric, and fastest platform that lets you label, annotate, version, and deploy your data for training models. It also orchestrates your annotation jobs, improving collaboration with members and annotators. \\
\\
With Ocular Bolt, shift from humans in the loop to experts in the loop to supercharge your data labeling and annotation projects. Our global expert workforce ensures fast, accurate results—no matter the scale or complexity of your data. \\
\\
Companies spend huge amounts on training data, but Foundry and Bolt are AI-native tools that lower costs, reduce manual effort, and accelerate high-quality data collection. We’re replacing outdated, clunky, and expensive data software!\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI-Native Data Engine for LLMs, Computer Vision, & Enterprise AI\\
\\
Ocular AI is the data annotation engine for Generative AI, Computer Vision, and Enterprise AI models.\\
\\
We help you transform unstructured, multi-modal data into golden datasets to power generative AI, frontier models, and computer vision. \\
\\
Ocular Foundry is the most intuitive, data-centric, and fastest platform that lets you label, annotate, version, and deploy your data for training models. It also orchestrates your annotation jobs, improving collaboration with members and annotators. \\
\\
With Ocular Bolt, shift from humans in the loop to experts in the loop to supercharge your data labeling and annotation projects. Our global expert workforce ensures fast, accurate results—no matter the scale or complexity of your data. \\
\\
Companies spend huge amounts on training data, but Foundry and Bolt are AI-native tools that lower costs, reduce manual effort, and accelerate high-quality data collection. We’re replacing outdated, clunky, and expensive data software!\\

OutRival, Inc.W19San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI Agents for Admissions Teams in Higher Education\\
\\
OutRival empowers customer experience teams to create and deploy Conversational AI Agents that leverage existing resources, cut costs, and grow revenue. Starting with Admissions Teams in Higher Education.\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/outrival-inc) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/cd5b61907c3569a6b9a7653c553f169ebd5b23c1.png)\\
\\
PactimaS21Ottawa, ON, Canada\\
\\
Live video signing for real-time agreements\\
\\
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company that’s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.\\
\\
Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.\\
\\
Ottawa, ON, Canada\\
\\
Live video signing for real-time agreements\\
\\
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company that’s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.\\
\\
Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.\\

Moktar Yusuf\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/pactima) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/0b89cac566636a744bfbbc0aa673ff4d81b1b779.png)\\
\\
Pair TeamS19San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Building the safety net of the future\\
\\
Pair Team is building a new kind of healthcare system across Medicaid, Medicare, and public assistance programs: one that recognizes that access to housing, nutritious food, and reliable transportation are just as critical to health as having the right medications or seeing a doctor. We run one of the largest medical groups for complex, low income patients and our next chapter is building a vertically integrated AI care manager to support any clinical, behavioral, or social need for everyone.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
Building the safety net of the future\\
\\
Pair Team is building a new kind of healthcare system across Medicaid, Medicare, and public assistance programs: one that recognizes that access to housing, nutritious food, and reliable transportation are just as critical to health as having the right medications or seeing a doctor. We run one of the largest medical groups for complex, low income patients and our next chapter is building a vertically integrated AI care manager to support any clinical, behavioral, or social need for everyone.\\

\\
John Anisere\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/partna) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/0759b46550e74b852273c768ee9c77b38e9e95be.png)\\
\\
PatikaS22Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
Automating entry of sales orders from emails/Whatsapp into ERP…\\
\\
Our Product: Sanifu\\
\\
Sanifu enables manufacturers and distributors to automate the entry of sales orders from emails and WhatsApp into their ERP systems. By extracting customer order details from various formats—including emails, PDFs, and handwritten notes—and accurately entering the data into ERP systems, Sanifu significantly reduces manual data entry time and errors. This automation enhances overall efficiency for businesses, allowing them to scale more effectively and focus on core operations. We are targeting a market of 180,000 manufacturers and distributors across Africa, representing a $2.5B+ opportunity.\\
\\
Sidney and Phelix, who met 10 years ago at a leadership program by Mastercard and Equity Bank, are technical founders with 5+ years experience working together to build payments platforms that processed $10M monthly GTV across Kenya, Uganda & Nigeria.\\
\\
Nairobi, Kenya\\
\\
Automating entry of sales orders from emails/Whatsapp into ERP…\\
\\
Our Product: Sanifu\\
\\
Sanifu enables manufacturers and distributors to automate the entry of sales orders from emails and WhatsApp into their ERP systems. By extracting customer order details from various formats—including emails, PDFs, and handwritten notes—and accurately entering the data into ERP systems, Sanifu significantly reduces manual data entry time and errors. This automation enhances overall efficiency for businesses, allowing them to scale more effectively and focus on core operations. We are targeting a market of 180,000 manufacturers and distributors across Africa, representing a $2.5B+ opportunity.\\
\\
Sidney and Phelix, who met 10 years ago at a leadership program by Mastercard and Equity Bank, are technical founders with 5+ years experience working together to build payments platforms that processed $10M monthly GTV across Kenya, Uganda & Nigeria.\\
\\

\\
Phelix Juma\\
\\

\\
PayflowS20New York, NY, USA\\
\\
AI FP&A Agent for insights, reports, planning and forecasting.\\
\\
Building Luca: an AI FP&A analyst providing executives with AI-powered financial insights, analytics, detailed reporting, planning and forecasting. Luca enables companies to save tens of thousands of dollars and 400+ hours per year, while getting critical business value from week one.\\
Level-3 autonomy for FP&A. Learn more: https://payflow.ai\\

Ezra Olubi\\

CTO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/paystack) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/ea6a449b48ce7b708258491acd97425dd01da55b.png)\\
\\
PideakyS21Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico\\
\\
We help offline LatAm SMBs manage and accelerate their cash-flow \\
\\
Pideaky helps offline LatAm SMBs manage and accelerate their cash flow through AI collection agents, which remind, collect, and negotiate bills on behalf of SMBS in Latam.\\
We focus on the massively underserved $70B/year customer segment as our wedge — Mexican corner shops and corner shop providers:\\
\\

\\
PigeonW22Miami, FL, USA\\
\\
Simplifying loans with your friends & family.\\
\\
Pigeon is a relationship based technology platform that facilitates the creation and management of loans between friends, family, loved ones, and anyone who trusts one another.\\
\\
By providing smarter ways for people to mix money with their relationships, Pigeon seeks to empower individuals to borrow and lend money with the people they trust.\\
\\
Miami, FL, USA\\
\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/pingpong) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/fd4e4e9c1afabc39fd1748565af4e0fe70ed996f.png)\\
\\
Players' LoungeW18Brooklyn, NY, USA\\
\\
Win money betting on yourself playing AAA video games\\
\\
Players’ Lounge enables gamers of all skill levels to bet on the outcome of their video game matches and win money. Our mission at Players’ Lounge is to give gamers a monetary return on their gaming time, while adding a new layer of fun and entertainment. \\
\\
We have raised $15m in funding. Investors include: ycombinator, Samsung, Griffin Gaming Partners, Strauss Zelnick, Drake and Myles Garrett.\\
\\
Brooklyn, NY, USA\\
\\
Win money betting on yourself playing AAA video games\\
\\
Players’ Lounge enables gamers of all skill levels to bet on the outcome of their video game matches and win money. Our mission at Players’ Lounge is to give gamers a monetary return on their gaming time, while adding a new layer of fun and entertainment. \\
\\
We have raised $15m in funding. Investors include: ycombinator, Samsung, Griffin Gaming Partners, Strauss Zelnick, Drake and Myles Garrett.\\

Eni Joshua\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/plumter) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/cdb97ca4207ccb8346f6dd29984f5fca487812e0.png)\\
\\
PocketSuiteW16San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
PocketSuite makes it easy for your clients to book and pay you\\
\\
PocketSuite is a YC-backed mobile platform for service businesses, ranging from fitness trainers, photographers, and home cleaners to dog trainers, hairstylists, therapists, and life coaches. Businesses use PocketSuite to get booked, paid, and message their clients. We make the work of running your own business simple for solo operators and small teams. PocketSuite empowers the U.S. market of 20 million service professionals generating $800 billion in sales with a mobile cloud solution for running their business. Thousands of businesses run on PocketSuite. Over 500,000 clients book and pay their Pros on PocketSuite today and we're growing fast.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
PocketSuite makes it easy for your clients to book and pay you\\
\\
PocketSuite is a YC-backed mobile platform for service businesses, ranging from fitness trainers, photographers, and home cleaners to dog trainers, hairstylists, therapists, and life coaches. Businesses use PocketSuite to get booked, paid, and message their clients. We make the work of running your own business simple for solo operators and small teams. PocketSuite empowers the U.S. market of 20 million service professionals generating $800 billion in sales with a mobile cloud solution for running their business. Thousands of businesses run on PocketSuite. Over 500,000 clients book and pay their Pros on PocketSuite today and we're growing fast.\\
\\

PointOneW24New York, NY, USA\\
\\
Automated time tracking and billing for law firms.\\
\\
Lawyers have to manually track all their client work in 6-minute increments. PointOne uses AI to completely automate time tracking and bill review, helping law firms collect more revenue and saving lawyers hours each week.\\

PropexoW23Boston, MA, USA\\
\\
Plaid for Commercial Real Estate\\
\\
Propexo lets engineers build, test, and launch CRE software integrations in days, not months. We modernize the developer experience for our customers, providing clear documentation and robust infrastructure to support the needs of property owners, property managers, & proptechs.\\

Plaid for Commercial Real Estate\\

\\
Remen Okoruwa\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/propexo) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/099267e4ee22818f2d0af078193f368735107d1e.png)\\
\\
PropRiseS23San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI Operating System for Commercial Real Estate\\
\\
PropRise is building the AI operating system for commercial real estate investing. We automate the entire workflow from sourcing to closing: our AI finds deals nationwide that match your criteria, then populates your Excel models in an instant. CRE teams currently waste 80% of their time on manual tasks and miss profitable deals because they can't analyze fast enough. Major firms like Colliers and Public Storage already use us to analyze 7x more deals. We're creating the first end-to-end platform that acts as the system of autonomy, intelligence, and record for the $20 trillion CRE market.\\
\\
San Francisco, CA, USA\\
\\
AI Operating System for Commercial Real Estate\\
\\
PropRise is building the AI operating system for commercial real estate investing. We automate the entire workflow from sourcing to closing: our AI finds deals nationwide that match your criteria, then populates your Excel models in an instant. CRE teams currently waste 80% of their time on manual tasks and miss profitable deals because they can't analyze fast enough. Major firms like Colliers and Public Storage already use us to analyze 7x more deals. We're creating the first end-to-end platform that acts as the system of autonomy, intelligence, and record for the $20 trillion CRE market.\\

\\
Frederik Obasi\\
\\
Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/prospa) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/ab395c9348a7c63120116c2e7ac1f9f2f257c543.png)\\
\\
PykaS17Alameda, CA, USA\\
\\
Autonomous electric airplanes\\
\\
Pyka’s goal is to provide society with a new form of safe, clean, and cost-effective transportation enabled by autonomous electric aviation. \\
\\
To get there, we’re taking a different approach than most. We're applying our technologies to every industry where autonomous electric aircraft can be useful, starting with the highest value and most dangerous jobs. In doing so, we're building game-changing products manufactured at scale, while perfecting the safety, reliability, and capabilities of our autonomy engine and electric propulsion systems. \\
\\
We design, develop and manufacture an ecosystem of technologies including proprietary flight control software, avionics, high power density motors, motor controllers, batteries, and custom carbon-fiber composite airframes.\\
\\
Today, we supply autonomous electric aircraft for cargo transport and crop protection to real-world customers across four separate continents and have secured industry-first regulatory approvals from the FAA. \\
\\
Our cargo aircraft enables remote connectivity, enhances express delivery networks, and ensures fast and reliable shipping of critical supplies to areas in need. Our crop protection aircraft offers agricultural services providers and farmers an autonomous tool to make aerial application safer, more precise, and less harmful to surrounding environments. Both vehicles are highly economical to operate, easy to deploy, and significantly reduce C02 emissions in their respective industries. \\
\\
What you work on at Pyka makes people’s lives better now and brings the future of electric aviation one step closer each day. \\
\\
Alameda, CA, USA\\
\\
Autonomous electric airplanes\\
\\
Pyka’s goal is to provide society with a new form of safe, clean, and cost-effective transportation enabled by autonomous electric aviation. \\
\\
To get there, we’re taking a different approach than most. We're applying our technologies to every industry where autonomous electric aircraft can be useful, starting with the highest value and most dangerous jobs. In doing so, we're building game-changing products manufactured at scale, while perfecting the safety, reliability, and capabilities of our autonomy engine and electric propulsion systems. \\
\\
We design, develop and manufacture an ecosystem of technologies including proprietary flight control software, avionics, high power density motors, motor controllers, batteries, and custom carbon-fiber composite airframes.\\
\\
Today, we supply autonomous electric aircraft for cargo transport and crop protection to real-world customers across four separate continents and have secured industry-first regulatory approvals from the FAA. \\
\\
Our cargo aircraft enables remote connectivity, enhances express delivery networks, and ensures fast and reliable shipping of critical supplies to areas in need. Our crop protection aircraft offers agricultural services providers and farmers an autonomous tool to make aerial application safer, more precise, and less harmful to surrounding environments. Both vehicles are highly economical to operate, easy to deploy, and significantly reduce C02 emissions in their respective industries. \\
\\
What you work on at Pyka makes people’s lives better now and brings the future of electric aviation one step closer each day. \\

Nathan White\\

CEO](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/pyka) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/247a74da94904c06b274f1d233ed28b07bb00ee7.png)\\

PyroscopeW21Oakland, CA, USA\\
\\
Open source continuous profiling software to debug performance issues\\
\\
Pyroscope is an open source continuous profiling platform. With just a few lines of code it will help you debug performance issues and find bottlenecks in your code.\\
\\
Oakland, CA, USA\\
\\
Open source continuous profiling software to debug performance issues\\
\\
Pyroscope is an open source continuous profiling platform. With just a few lines of code it will help you debug performance issues and find bottlenecks in your code.\\

Founder](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/pyroscope) [![](https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/909aa10f7285a7759bb72929bd69ffcfa9047309.png)\\
\\
PyxaiW19Boston, MA, USA\\
\\
An assessment tool that evaluates people to predict future success\\
\\
Pyxai helps organizations evaluate, identify and source top talent by focusing on the best indicators of long-term job success, soft skills. Our proprietary, AI driven assessment tool helps organizations increase retention by at least 30% all while reducing the time to hire by more than 50%.\\
\\
